name: Hazard Henry
description:
Created for the GMC Jam 47 (HAZARDOUS ENVIRONMENT)

Henry is having his first day at work. Sadly no one explained to him how to do his job! And if they did they didn't do a good job at it!! Feed the reactor! Try not the die! How long can you work before disaster strikes?

Art, Sounds, and Music by Evanski

W/A/S/D  -  Move
Space - Interact
